_components._string: To play this game, you must read and accept the following and confirm that you are 17 years old applicable in your country of residence. If you are under this age, your parent or guardian must review and accept the following:
_components._N$string: To play this game, you must read and accept the following and confirm that you are 17 years old applicable in your country of residence. If you are under this age, your parent or guardian must review and accept the following:

tutorialContent: Drag your finger on the screen to move around
Tap on the Enemies to Attack them!
Tap the Burst attack button to unlease a special move!

quotes: The great dusting is not over! Get back there and end up cleaning the house!
What would the great Van Helsing think of this?%nTry again!
¡Dios Mio! I was defeated!%nUrgh! I cannot give up!

_components._string: Personal data will be used to inform you when you're 1 of 50 winners of the contest. Make sure to use your real information.
_components._N$string: Personal data will be used to inform you when you're 1 of 50 winners of the contest. Make sure to use your real information.

_string:
Vampires are real.
They’ve been roaming this world for centuries.
In the shadows.

Guillermo lives in Staten Island with the vampires
Nandor, Lazlo, Nadja and Colin Robinson.
Acting as Nandor’s familiar for more than a decade, Guillermo hopes that one day,
he’ll finally be turned.

There’s just one slight problem: Guillermo is a descendant of the famous vampire hunter Van Helsing and proves to be very skilled at killing bloodsuckers….
unwittingly.

One day, as Guillermo comes back from an errand for Nandor, he finds the Vampire Residence awfully quiet.
_N$string:
Vampires are real.
They’ve been roaming this world for centuries.
In the shadows.

Guillermo lives in Staten Island with the vampires
Nandor, Lazlo, Nadja and Colin Robinson.
Acting as Nandor’s familiar for more than a decade, Guillermo hopes that one day,
he’ll finally be turned.

There’s just one slight problem: Guillermo is a descendant of the famous vampire hunter Van Helsing and proves to be very skilled at killing bloodsuckers….
unwittingly.

One day, as Guillermo comes back from an errand for Nandor, he finds the Vampire Residence awfully quiet.

_string:
After slaughtering countless vampires and werewolves, Guillermo eventually reaches the mansion’s foyer.
Nandor is still nowhere to be seen.

Upon calling out for his Master, Guillermo bumps into Nadja’s ghost in the form of a little doll.
She informs him that he’s currently being detained in his room by a member of the Vampiric Council. 

Armed with stakes and a crossbow and hooked on caffeine, Guillermo decides to muster his courage once again and goes on a quest to deliver Nandor.
_N$string:
After slaughtering countless vampires and werewolves, Guillermo eventually reaches the mansion’s foyer.
Nandor is still nowhere to be seen.

Upon calling out for his Master, Guillermo bumps into Nadja’s ghost in the form of a little doll.
She informs him that he’s currently being detained in his room by a member of the Vampiric Council. 

Armed with stakes and a crossbow and hooked on caffeine, Guillermo decides to muster his courage once again and goes on a quest to deliver Nandor.

_string:
Congratulations!
You’ve beaten the game!
Just like Guillermo, the blood a worthy Vampire Hunter runs in your veins.

As Guillermo and his vampire friends go back to a normal life, something tells you that their adventures are far from being over though…

To be continued.
_N$string:
Congratulations!
You’ve beaten the game!
Just like Guillermo, the blood a worthy Vampire Hunter runs in your veins.

As Guillermo and his vampire friends go back to a normal life, something tells you that their adventures are far from being over though…

To be continued.
